about.metaDescription: Learn about RAUV Film's philosophy and values.
about.mainQuote: 'We preserve emotions forever by capturing memories in film.'
about.heroText:
We are not simply people holding cameras.
We are storytellers who understand the emotions of your special day
and preserve them in the most beautiful way possible.
about.card1Desc:
So that today's emotions never feel distant, even after years.
Rather than excessive staging or artificial shooting,
we create videos infused with genuine feeling and atmosphere.
Not a video you watch once and forget,
but one that grows warmer even 10 years later.
about.card1Emphasis: A video that grows warmer even 10 years later
about.card2Desc:
The atmosphere of the venue, the dress, the bouquet, every detail of makeup —
we capture it all without missing a thing.
Driven by our commitment to preserving the most beautiful moments,
we shoot, color-correct, and edit like a film.
about.card2Emphasis: Shoot, color-correct, and edit like a film
about.card3Desc:
RAUV Film videos are completed not by part-time staff,
but by dedicated directors and our CEO personally.
Our directors have completed specialized training programs,
and we edit to create a natural flow.
Memories that last are born from countless hours of deliberation.
about.card4Desc:
A wedding is just one short day,
but the video preserving its memories lasts a lifetime.
RAUV Film ensures that day never fades,
working with 4K resolution and equipment worth over $8,000.
Videos that become more precious as time goes by —
that's why we keep creating.
about.card4Emphasis: Videos that remain precious through time

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently asked questions
faq.a1: It's a 2-3 minute video featuring the most important scenes from the ceremony, produced in a music video format.
faq.q2: How long is the documentary-style video?
faq.a2:
We capture everything from the bridal room to the group photos. Since every ceremony is different, the length typically ranges from 30 minutes to 1 hour 30 minutes.

However, for the 1P 1Cam documentary video with a single camera, the video may be shorter than stated if the ceremony is very brief.
faq.a3: It's a 30-second to 1-minute video in 4K quality with vertical aspect ratio, perfect for Instagram Stories or Reels.
faq.q4: When will I receive my video?
faq.a4: We carefully work on each project in order, and delivery is within 3 months from your ceremony date.
faq.q5: Can I receive the raw footage?
faq.a5:
Since we shoot in 4K, the raw footage exceeds 70GB, making delivery difficult. Additionally, it's recorded in an editing format that isn't easily viewable through standard methods, so we don't provide it by default.

The documentary-style video already includes the complete ceremony process, so there's typically no need to purchase separately.

If you wish to have the raw footage for personal editing and uploading to SNS or YouTube, an additional 50,000 KRW fee applies, which covers the conversion process, usage guide, and USB/cloud delivery.
faq.q6: Can you accommodate my preferred editing style?
faq.a6: If you share a reference video, we'll do our best to match your preferences. Please note that additional fees may apply depending on the scope of customization.
faq.q7: When does the videographer arrive at the venue?
faq.a7:
We arrive 1 hour 30 minutes before the ceremony starts. For pre-ceremony shoots, we arrive approximately 2 hours early.

Filming begins 1 hour before the ceremony in the bridal room.

(For pre-ceremony shoots, filming begins 1 hour 30 minutes before.)
(Pre-ceremony and staged shoots at locations outside the venue and bridal room must be communicated in advance. Without prior notice or if venue conditions don't permit, filming may not be possible.)
faq.a8:
Yes, receipts are available for all packages at no additional charge.
(For contracts from May 1, 2025 onwards)
faq.a9:
Our main office is located near Seoul, and we recently opened a Cheongju branch. Travel fees apply for cities outside Seoul and Cheongju.

Travel fees for other areas are calculated based on the nearest branch to the venue. If all directors at the nearest branch are fully booked, a director from a farther location may be assigned, which could result in higher travel fees.
faq.q10: I'd like to add an SNS video to the Standard plan!
faq.a10: It can be added. Since this is not part of the standard offering, please understand that additional fees may apply.
faq.q11: When will I receive the final pre-shoot confirmation call?
faq.a11: We contact you by phone on Monday or Tuesday of your ceremony week. If you don't receive our call, please make sure to reach out via KakaoTalk or phone.

guidelines.pre1: Reservations are confirmed upon payment of the 100,000 KRW deposit and completion of the reservation post on the RAUV FILM website.
guidelines.pre2: Even if you have been notified that filming is available, the date may be closed without notice until the deposit is paid and the reservation post is submitted.
guidelines.pre3: Filming proceeds in the following order: Bridal room → Ceremony → Group photos → *Optional (Reception (Part 2) or Paebaek (traditional ceremony)).
guidelines.pre3Note: (Additional fees apply for Reception (Part 2) or Paebaek) (End times vary depending on options selected)
guidelines.pre4: Filming begins 1 hour before the ceremony, starting from the bridal room.
guidelines.pre5: A confirmation call will be made 4-5 days before the filming date.
guidelines.pre6: The remaining balance (excluding the deposit) should be transferred by the day before the filming date.
guidelines.pre7: All files are delivered via cloud transfer.
guidelines.pre8: Some footage may be uploaded to RAUV FILM's SNS or website with the client's prior consent.
guidelines.pre9: Filming methods may vary depending on the filming environment. Filming may not be possible in unexpected situations that have not been discussed in advance.
guidelines.post1: Wedding ceremony videos take approximately 60-80 days from the filming date.
guidelines.post2: Original and edited videos are stored for 2 months from the final delivery date and will be deleted without notice thereafter.
guidelines.post3: One free revision of the delivered edited video is available. (Additional revision requests will incur fees)
guidelines.post4: Please download the delivered files promptly. RAUV FILM is not responsible for delays caused by the client's unfamiliarity with download methods, decompression errors, or similar issues.
guidelines.post5: All consultations and requests are handled through the KakaoTalk RAUV FILM consultation channel. Please maintain your KakaoTalk consultation channel membership. RAUV FILM is not responsible for any disadvantages caused by leaving the consultation channel.
guidelines.post6: File delivery dates may change due to internal circumstances.
guidelines.post7: If original footage is deleted, re-delivery is not possible.

privacy.intro: RAUV FILM (hereinafter referred to as the 'Company') establishes and discloses the following privacy policy in accordance with Article 30 of the Personal Information Protection Act to protect the personal information of data subjects and to handle related complaints promptly and smoothly.
privacy.article1Intro: The Company processes personal information for the following purposes. Personal information being processed will not be used for purposes other than those stated below. If the purpose of use changes, necessary measures such as obtaining separate consent in accordance with Article 18 of the Personal Information Protection Act will be implemented.
privacy.article1Purpose1Desc: Personal information is processed for the purposes of confirming membership registration intent, identity verification and authentication for membership services, maintaining and managing membership, preventing unauthorized use of services, and various notifications.
privacy.article1Purpose2Desc: Personal information is processed for the purposes of product delivery, service provision, sending contracts and invoices, content delivery, customized service provision, and identity verification.
privacy.article1Purpose3Desc: Personal information is processed for the purposes of verifying the identity of the complainant, confirming the details of the complaint, contacting and notifying for fact-finding, and notifying of processing results.
privacy.article2Title: Article 2 (Processing and Retention Period of Personal Information)
privacy.article2Para1: ① The Company processes and retains personal information within the retention and use period prescribed by law or within the retention and use period agreed upon when collecting personal information from the data subject.
privacy.article2Para2: ② The processing and retention periods for each type of personal information are as follows.
privacy.article2Retention1Title: Website reservation posts and customer management: 4 years from the contract date
privacy.article2Retention1Desc: However, in the following cases, until the relevant reason ceases to exist:
privacy.article2Retention1Sub1: If an investigation or inquiry due to a violation of relevant laws is ongoing, until the conclusion of such investigation or inquiry
privacy.article2Retention1Sub2: If claims and obligations under the wedding filming contract remain, until such claims and obligations are settled
privacy.article2Retention2Title: Service provision: Until service delivery and settlement are completed
privacy.article2Retention2Desc: However, in the following cases, until the relevant period expires:
privacy.article2Retention2Law1Intro: Retention periods under the Act on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce, etc.
privacy.article2Retention2Law1Item1: Records of display and advertising: 6 months
privacy.article2Retention2Law1Item2: Records of contracts or subscription withdrawal, payment, and supply of goods: 5 years
privacy.article2Retention2Law1Item3: Records of consumer complaints or dispute resolution: 3 years
privacy.article2Retention2Law2Intro: Retention of communications confirmation data under Article 41 of the Protection of Communications Secrets Act
privacy.article2Retention2Law2Item1: Subscriber telecommunications dates, start/end times, counterparty subscriber numbers, usage frequency, and base station location tracking data: 1 year
privacy.article2Retention2Law2Item2: Computer communications, internet log records, and access point tracking data: 3 months
privacy.article3Title: Article 3 (Provision of Personal Information to Third Parties)
privacy.article3Para1: ① The Company processes personal information of data subjects only within the scope specified in Article 1 (Purpose of Processing Personal Information) and provides personal information to third parties only in cases falling under Article 17 of the Personal Information Protection Act, such as consent of the data subject or special provisions of law.
privacy.article3Para2: ② The Company provides personal information to the minimum extent necessary with the consent of the data subject in the following cases for smooth service provision.
privacy.article3Provider: Recipients of personal information: RAUV FILM partner companies
privacy.article3Purpose: Purpose of use by recipients: Partner company customer management and reservation management, grievance resolution
privacy.article3Items: Personal information items provided: Names of the wedding couple (Groom, Bride), mobile phone numbers (Groom, Bride), email, name of the person making the reservation, wedding-related information (venue, date, time)
privacy.article3Retention: Retention and use period by recipients: Until grievance handling is completed after the provision of partner products
privacy.article5Title: Article 5 (Rights of Data Subjects and Legal Representatives and Methods of Exercising Such Rights)
privacy.article5Para1: ① Data subjects may exercise the following rights related to the protection of personal information against the Company at any time.
privacy.article5Right2: Request for correction in case of errors, etc.
privacy.article5Para2: ② The exercise of rights under Paragraph 1 may be made through written documents, telephone, email, etc. to the Company, and the Company will take action without delay.
privacy.article5Para3: ③ If a data subject requests correction or deletion of errors in personal information, the Company will not use or provide the relevant personal information until the correction or deletion is completed.
privacy.article5Para4: ④ The exercise of rights under Paragraph 1 may also be made through an agent such as a legal representative of the data subject or a person delegated by the data subject.
privacy.article5Para5: ⑤ Data subjects must not infringe upon the personal information or privacy of themselves or others processed by the Company in violation of the Personal Information Protection Act and other relevant laws.
privacy.article6Intro: The Company processes the following personal information items.
privacy.article6ItemDesc: Required items: Name, mobile phone number, email, name of the person making the reservation, names of the wedding couple (Groom, Bride), home address
privacy.article7Para1: ① The Company destroys personal information without delay when it becomes unnecessary, such as upon expiration of the retention period or achievement of the processing purpose.
privacy.article7Para2: ② If personal information must continue to be retained under other laws despite the expiration of the retention period agreed upon by the data subject or the achievement of the processing purpose, the personal information shall be moved to a separate database (DB) or stored in a different location.
privacy.article7Para3: ③ The procedures and methods for destroying personal information are as follows.
privacy.article7Method1Desc: The Company selects personal information for which the reason for destruction has occurred and destroys the personal information with the approval of the Company's Personal Information Protection Officer.
privacy.article7Method2Desc: The Company destroys personal information recorded and stored in electronic file format in a manner that prevents the records from being reproduced, and destroys personal information recorded and stored on paper documents by shredding or incineration.
privacy.article8Title: Article 8 (Measures to Ensure the Safety of Personal Information)
privacy.article8Intro: The Company takes the following measures to ensure the safety of personal information.
privacy.article8Measure1: Administrative measures: Establishment and implementation of internal management plans, regular employee training, etc.
privacy.article8Measure2: Technical measures: Management of access rights to personal information processing systems, installation of access control systems, encryption of unique identification information, installation of security programs
privacy.article8Measure3: Physical measures: Access control to server rooms, data storage rooms, etc.
privacy.article9Title: Article 9 (Matters Concerning the Installation, Operation, and Rejection of Automatic Personal Information Collection Devices)
privacy.article9Para1: ① The Company uses 'cookies' that store and retrieve usage information to provide individually customized services to users.
privacy.article9Para2: ② Cookies are small pieces of information sent by the server (HTTP) operating the website to the user's computer browser and may be stored on the hard disk of the user's PC.
privacy.article9Para3: ③ Data subjects may allow or block cookies through web browser option settings.
privacy.article9WebChrome: Chrome: Browser settings > Privacy and security > Clear browsing data
privacy.article9WebEdge: Edge: Browser settings > Cookies and site permissions > Manage and delete cookies and site data
privacy.article9MobileChrome: Chrome: Mobile browser settings > Privacy and security > Clear browsing data
privacy.article9MobileSafari: Safari: Mobile device settings > Safari > Advanced > Block All Cookies
privacy.article9MobileSamsung: Samsung Internet: Mobile browser settings > Browsing history > Clear browsing data
privacy.article9Para4: ④ The Company may analyze and use access frequency, visit times, service usage records, etc. to provide optimized customized services and benefits to users during the course of service use.
privacy.article10Intro: ① The Company designates the following Personal Information Protection Officer to oversee all matters related to personal information processing and to handle complaints and remedy damages of data subjects related to personal information processing.

The Company will respond to and process data subjects' inquiries without delay.

terms.article1Content: Service users are subject to these Terms in relation to the use of wedding ceremony filming services provided by RAUV FILM, and are deemed to have agreed to these Terms upon making a reservation.
terms.article2Item1: RAUV FILM collects the minimum personal information necessary for the smooth provision of services, and the collected information is used solely for the purpose of service provision.
terms.article2Item2: RAUV FILM will not provide personal information received from service users to third parties without their consent, except as required by law.
terms.article3Intro: Reservations may be invalidated in the following circumstances.
terms.article3Item1: If the contract contains false information, or if the contract was concluded based on false information provided by the client
terms.article3Item2: If sufficient information has been provided but the deposit has not been paid within the designated deadline
terms.article4Intro: Refunds may be requested within 1 week of the deposit payment. After that period, the following provisions apply.
terms.article4Note1: Refund of the deposit is not available for cancellations due to a simple change of mind.
terms.article4Note2: Cancellation 45 days before the filming date: Compensation of 50% of the total product amount
terms.article4Note3: Cancellation 30 days before the filming date: Compensation of 100% of the total product amount
terms.article4Note4: However, in case of cancellation due to unavoidable circumstances, the reservation may be transferred to another person.
terms.article5Intro: In accordance with consumer damage compensation regulations, in the event of loss of all filmed footage or accidents caused by disasters, the following compensation standards apply.
terms.article5CompTitle: ■ Compensation standards for footage loss due to other causes after filming
terms.article5Comp1: Total loss of footage for 1 Person 1 Camera [Budget Type]: 300,000 KRW
terms.article5Comp2: Loss of footage from one camera for 1 Person 2 Cameras [Standard Type]: 300,000 KRW
terms.article5Comp3: Total loss of footage for 1 Person 2 Cameras [Standard Type]: 600,000 KRW
terms.article5Comp4: Total audio loss of video files: 150,000 KRW per camera / Partial loss to be negotiated
terms.article5Comp5: In case of partial footage loss, compensation shall be negotiated based on the ratio of lost time to total filming time according to the extent of the loss
terms.article5Disclaimer: Compensation does not cover dissatisfaction due to a simple change of mind, dislike of the video style, or results influenced by environmental factors at the filming venue (lighting, noise, movement restrictions, etc.).
terms.article5Unable: If RAUV FILM encounters a situation where it is unable to carry out the contracted filming, substitute personnel will be deployed or a resolution will be reached through consultation with the client. If substitute personnel cannot be deployed, the full amount received will be refunded.
terms.article6Line1: Copyright is owned by RAUV FILM, and RAUV FILM may use the filming results for marketing purposes.
terms.article6Line2: Portrait rights of all persons appearing in the product belong to the Bride and Groom.
terms.article7Line1: All contents of the contract shall not be disclosed to external parties.
terms.article7Line2: In the event of damage caused by non-compliance with the contract terms, both parties shall bear legal responsibility.

reviewGuide.metaTitle: Booking Review Writing Guide | RAUV Film
reviewGuide.metaDescription: RAUV Film booking review writing guide. Learn how to write reviews and the benefits you can receive.
reviewGuide.intro: Please refer to the guide below when writing your review
reviewGuide.onlyBookingReview: Only booking reviews can be submitted
reviewGuide.onlyBookingReviewDesc: Only reviews related to your booking can be submitted, with a maximum of 3 reviews.
reviewGuide.deadlineNotice: Booking reviews must be written within 1 month of the contract date.
reviewGuide.submitNotice: Submit your review on the website to receive your benefits!
reviewGuide.budgetProductDesc: For the budget package, only 1 review is accepted, and upon submission, original footage will be provided.
reviewGuide.benefitsApplyNote: * The benefits below apply to Standard and Cinematic packages.
reviewGuide.benefit3Desc: 20,000 KRW discount + SNS video provided + all original footage provided
reviewGuide.benefitsFootnote: * One blog post and one cafe post each (max 3 total)
reviewGuide.blogCafeGuide1: Include 'your wedding venue' + 'RAUV Film' + 'wedding ceremony DVD' in the title
reviewGuide.blogCafeGuide2pre: In the body, use at least 10 screenshots from RAUV Film's portfolio videos and include
reviewGuide.blogCafeGuide2post: links to the RAUV Film website and KakaoTalk channel!
reviewGuide.blogCafeGuide3: Feel free to write about why you decided to get a ceremony DVD and why you chose RAUV Film
reviewGuide.blogCafeGuide4: Cafe posts must be set to public
reviewGuide.recommendedCafesDesc: If your planner's company has a cafe, please check whether non-affiliated companies can be mentioned, then
reviewGuide.recommendedCafesDescSuffix: post in the DVD-related tab or buddy-finding tab.
reviewGuide.directWeddingWarning: Posts and comments cannot be written on Direct Wedding cafe
reviewGuide.tipDesc: Write your buddy code as "wedding date + contractor name" at the bottom, and
reviewGuide.tipDescSuffix: when other brides see it and sign up, you'll each get a 10,000 KRW discount on your balance -- so don't forget to include it!
reviewGuide.findBuddyTitle: Increase Your Chances of Finding a Buddy
reviewGuide.findBuddyDesc: Use the following templates when posting comments or threads in wedding cafes or wedding hall group chats
reviewGuide.threadCommentDesc: Leave comments on Threads posts or for couples searching "wedding preparation" who haven't decided on a DVD yet
reviewGuide.threadCommentSample:
"I signed with RAUV Film and I'm really satisfied, so I recommend them!
If you use my buddy code, you'll get a discount too -- let's be buddies :)
Wedding date + Contractor name"
reviewGuide.groupChatTitle: Wedding Hall Group Chat / Wedding Cafe Recommendation
reviewGuide.groupChatDesc: When you post recommendations or comments in group chats and wedding cafes,
reviewGuide.groupChatDescSuffix: more people can become your buddies and your discount amount increases!
reviewGuide.groupChatSample:
"After much deliberation, I decided on RAUV Film --
the portfolio and event benefits are great!
Let's be buddies :)"
reviewGuide.dmDesc: Send a message to those looking for DVD recommendations with "your package + reason for recommending + buddy code" to increase your chances of finding a buddy!
